label: A7B2C3_oC48_63_c2eg_g_cg-001
title: Sr$_{3}$SnO$_{7}$ Structure
comments:
This is a Ruddlesden-Popper structure, the ternary form of \href{current_web_home_dir/A2BC2D7_oC48_63_g_c_g_c2eg-001}{LaCa$_{2}$Mn$_{2}$O$_{7}$}. 
 (Grenn, 2000) give the coordinates of the O III (8e) site as (0,.5873,0,0), while the ICSD CIF gives it as (0.5873,1/2,1/2).  The ICSD position is in agreement with the Sn-O distance given in the paper, so we use that as our starting value.
